item.title: Charles Kipps and Tom Fontana Running for President of Writers Guild East
item.description: Lisa Takeuchi Cullen is exiting as leader of the New York-based union, which covers screenwriters and television writers, online and broadcast journalists and podcast workers.

item.title: CBS News Digital’s WGA East Union Members Reach Deal on Three-Year Contract, One Week Before Skydance Is Set to Take Over
